message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to part with it for $9500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your offer, Bob, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. It's a fair compromise, considering the value I'm bringing to the table. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $8500. Could you consider meeting me at $8800?

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $9200. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll meet you at $9100. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $9000. Can you meet me there?
